PAD_NotShadowheart.synopsis: When trying to talk to Nightsong, exclaims that it is better to leave it to Shadowheart
PAD_NotShadowheart.how_to_trigger: 1. Set the shadowheart act 2 epilogue nightsong camp night through origin debug book2. Start camp night3. Talk to Nightsong with avatar that isn't Shadowheart

PAD_WrongAvatar.synopsis: When trying to talk to Nightsong, exclaims that it is better to leave it to the avatar who is controlling Shadowheart.
PAD_WrongAvatar.how_to_trigger: 1. Set the shadowheart act 2 epilogue nightsong camp night through origin debug book2. Start camp night3. Talk to Nightsong with avatar that isn't controlling Shadowheart

PAD_ShadowheartUnavailable.synopsis: When trying to talk to Nightsong, exclaims that Shadowheart is preoccupied with something else.
PAD_ShadowheartUnavailable.how_to_trigger: 1. Set the shadowheart act 2 epilogue nightsong camp night through origin debug book2. Start camp night3. Talk to Nightsong while Shadowheart is occupied

PAD_NotShadowheart_0.speaker: Player
PAD_NotShadowheart_0.text: I think Shadowheart would like a word.

PAD_WrongAvatar_0.speaker: Player
PAD_WrongAvatar_0.text: Where's Shadowheart? I think she'll want a word.

PAD_ShadowheartUnavailable_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ShadowheartUnavailable_0.text: Shadowheart needs to speak to her more than I do. Better wait until she is free.
